name: Sarthak Srivastava
tagline: Aerospace Engineer. Performance Athlete. Learning Machine.
body:
## About Me
Currently working with [Rolls-Royce@NTU Corporate Lab](http://rrntucorplab.ntu.edu.sg/Research/Pages/mrt-.aspx) on optimizing Vibratory Finishing of Jet Engine components.
Interested in Engineering Design, Physical Sciences and Scientific Computation.
Besides solving equations, I enjoy devouring books, pushing my body to its limits and drumming along to rock music.  

### Projects
You may use the below links to follow my projects. I design my projects/ goals to enable a holistic physical and intellectual development. The underlying belief is always to wake up stronger and smarter every morning.   

### What I follow
A compendium of pages/ links which keep me informed and motivated. 

### Reach Me
I would love to hear from you. Tell me something funny/witty/interesting. Hit me up for coffee. Ask me to travel/ do business with you.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
